TneSparkle Methods

Methods
 NameDescription
CheckUpdate(TUpdateType)

Calls the appropriate check update method depending on the updateType.

CheckUpdateWithoutUI

Doesn't show the window with the release notes. It just downloads the file and executes it.

CheckUpdateWithUI

Show a window with release notes and provides choices before downloading the updates.

CheckUpdateWithUIandInstall

Same as CheckUpdateWithUI but installs automatically the downloaded file.

Cleanup

Represents method Cleanup.

ExecuteReferencedFunctionBoolean(PWideChar,TCallbackTypeFunc,TFunc)

Represents method ExecuteReferencedFunctionBoolean(PWideChar,TCallbackTypeFunc,TFunc).

ExecuteReferencedProcedure(PWideChar,TCallbackType,TProc)

Represents method ExecuteReferencedProcedure(PWideChar,TCallbackType,TProc).

ExecuteSimpleProcedure(PWideChar)

Represents method ExecuteSimpleProcedure(PWideChar).

GetAppBuildVersion

Represents method GetAppBuildVersion.

GetAppcastURL

Represents method GetAppcastURL.

GetAutoCheckForUpdates

Represents method GetAutoCheckForUpdates.

getDLLLoaded

Represents method getDLLLoaded.

GetLastCheckTime

Represents method GetLastCheckTime.

GetRegistryPath

Represents method GetRegistryPath.

GetUpdateCheckInterval

Represents method GetUpdateCheckInterval.

Init

Initialises WinSparkle.

ResetUpdateCheckInterval

Resets the check interval to the default value (86400 secs)

SetAppBuildVersion(string)

Represents method SetAppBuildVersion(string).

SetAppcastURL(string)

Represents method SetAppcastURL(string).

SetAppDetails(string,string,string)

Sets the application details.

SetAutoCheckForUpdates(Boolean)

Represents method SetAutoCheckForUpdates(Boolean).

setDSAPublicPem(String)

Represents method setDSAPublicPem(String).

SetLang(string)

Sets the language of the UI.

SetLangID(ShortInt)

Sets the language using the LanguageID.

SetOnCanShutDown(TFunc)

Represents method SetOnCanShutDown(TFunc).

SetOnDidFindUpdate(TProc)

Represents method SetOnDidFindUpdate(TProc).

SetOnDidNotFindUpdate(TProc)

Represents method SetOnDidNotFindUpdate(TProc).

SetOnError(TProc)

Represents method SetOnError(TProc).

SetOnShutDown(TProc)

Represents method SetOnShutDown(TProc).

SetOnUpdateCancelled(TProc)

Represents method SetOnUpdateCancelled(TProc).

SetRegistryPath(string)

Represents method SetRegistryPath(string).

Represents method SetUpdateCheckInterval(Integer).
